item.title: CVE-2022-27168|2024-08-03T05:18:39.338Z -- litecart -- litecart
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in LiteCart versions prior to 2.4.2 allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.
